name: Laworde
description:
Laworde is a simple implementation of the recently popular word guessing game in FirmWeave 2.5, a fork of the ZZT game engine by WiL, made in about a day or two.

The goal of Laworde is to guess a randomly chosen word by providing valid English words. You get six tries - after each try, the game provides feedback about which letters appear in the word.

Also available on the Museum of ZZT!
